If you answered YES, you must check MagicPattern.


MagicPattern is a one-click editor for unique background SVG patterns. Create unlimited patterns with a few clicks and embed them in your designs.


This is a quick guide to help you create custom pattern packs for MagicPattern utilizing your own branding assets.
